name: ReelScript
description: Video learning platform — download, transcribe, translate, and analyze video content

endpoints.name: process_video
endpoints.description: Download and process a video from URL (YouTube, Instagram, Bilibili, TikTok). Triggers async pipeline: download → transcribe → translate → analyze

url.description: Video URL from supported platforms (YouTube, Instagram, Bilibili, TikTok)

endpoints.name: get_video
endpoints.description: Get video details with full transcript, translations, and vocabulary

endpoints.name: translate_video
endpoints.description: Translate video transcript segments to Traditional Chinese

endpoints.name: analyze_vocabulary
endpoints.description: Extract useful English vocabulary (phrasal verbs, idioms, collocations) with Chinese translations

endpoints.name: appreciate_video
endpoints.description: Generate content appreciation: theme, key points, and golden quotes (en + zh)

endpoints.name: get_article
endpoints.description: Get blog-ready article: theme, key points, golden quotes, bilingual segments, vocabulary

endpoints.name: get_learning_cards
endpoints.description: Get all segments as ordered bilingual learning cards with vocabulary

endpoints.name: get_audio
endpoints.description: Extract MP3 audio with bilingual timeline from a video

endpoints.name: search
endpoints.description: Search across all video content (keyword or AI semantic search)

mode.description: Search mode: keyword (fast) or semantic (AI-powered, slower)

endpoints.name: list_videos
endpoints.description: List public videos with pagination and optional featured filter

endpoints.name: random_snippet
endpoints.description: Get a random bilingual learning snippet (one complete sentence with translation and vocabulary)

endpoints.name: daily_snippet
endpoints.description: Get today's featured learning snippet (deterministic per day)

endpoints.name: list_vocabulary
endpoints.description: Get aggregated vocabulary across all videos with pagination

endpoints.name: list_quotes
endpoints.description: Get golden quotes (en + zh) from all video appreciations

endpoints.name: get_quota
endpoints.description: Get current monthly usage quota (plan, used, remaining, bonus)
